title: Can they lower the grade if I apply for re-evaluation?

comments.body: Yup ðŸ˜‚ it's a re-val, there's a high chance a person who hasn't checked your paper will check.. your marks/grade can reduce too
I heard a case in which a guy applied for re-eval in a subject in which he got S. So COE reduced his grade to A. But subjects i am applying for all have B or A
Why tf did he apply when he got S grade?
I would suggest to first check your paper, consult with your friends and then apply.
The batches keep getting dumber and hornier.

No, for sure 100% grade won't be reduced, it will remain the same or it may increase but they won't grade it down 
by deputy coe
The deputy controller of examination at ec campus told the exact same thing to people when i applied the last, your grade will remain the same or may go up

bruh I think ive heard of this story before 

Some guys father applied review for S grade thinking its the worst grade. Then it got reduced.

​

I don't buy it tho.
